item.title: Python PEP
item.description: PEP 8 – Style Guide for Python Code https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/ pep7是C风格指南，pep20是zen of python. 1 2 # 查看pep20 >import this PEP 257 – Docstring Conventions https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0257/
